entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is introduced as a character who lives in the village and has children.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: Cedric Diggory is mentioned as someone Harry had to get up early for, implying they are friends or acquaintances.

entities.name: amos diggory
entities.description: Amos Diggory is introduced as a character who peered good-naturedly at the Weasley boys and Harry.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as having a friend named Hermione.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is introduced as a friend of Ron's and Harry's.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is mentioned as one of Mr. Weasley's children.

relationships.description: Amos Diggory knows Mr. Weasley, as evidenced by his good-naturedly peering at the Weasley boys.
Ron Weasley is friends with Hermione Granger.
Mr. Weasley is the parent of Ginny Weasley.
Ron Weasley is friends with Harry Potter.
Hermione Granger is a friend of Ron's, as evidenced by her being introduced as his friend.
